name: OCKContactStoreDelegate
desc: An object that receives change callbacks from contact stores.

items.name: func contactStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyContactStore, didAddContacts: [OCKAnyContact])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you add contacts to the store.

items.name: func contactStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyContactStore, didUpdateContacts: [OCKAnyContact])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you update contacts in the store.

items.name: func contactStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyContactStore, didDeleteContacts: [OCKAnyContact])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you delete contacts from the store.
